level.text: If the licensee does not superintend in person the operation or conduct of the hotel or motel, the licensee shall designate a manager or other responsible person who shall superintend in person the operation or conduct of the hotel or motel.
The designated manager or other responsible person shall have complete charge of the operation and conduct of the hotel or motel.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: The Housing Regulations of the District of Columbia, 5G DCRR § 7201, Commissioners’ Order 53-1503 (August 11, 1955); as amended by Commissioners’ Order 63-1354 (June 6, 1963), 9 DCR 276 (June 24, 1963).
